solution_line_template: He earned {num_large_paintings} x ${price_large_painting} = ${<<{num_large_paintings}*{price_large_painting}={earnings_large_paintings}>>}{earnings_large_paintings} for the large painting.
And he earned {num_small_paintings} x ${price_small_painting} = ${<<{num_small_paintings}*{price_small_painting}={earnings_small_paintings}>>}{earnings_small_paintings} for the small paintings.
Therefore, he earned a total of ${earnings_large_paintings} + ${earnings_small_paintings} = ${<<{earnings_large_paintings}+{earnings_small_paintings}={total_earnings}>>}{total_earnings} in all.
